name: Alpha Sniper Attack Mission
description:
Alpha Sniper Attack Mission is a modern war game in which you have to counter the strike of terrorists. The castle is under attack and you have to protect it. Use your sniper shooting skills and eliminate all the attackers.
Features:
- Realistic FPS commando graphics.
- Extreme Actions on the frontline commando kombat.
- Realistic sniper shooting skills.
- Advance commando combat war zone.
